author: terencechain
content: Verified locally: `[2025-03-15 21:03:44]  INFO slotutil: 32h6m15s until chain genesis genesisStateRoot=2683ebc120f91f740c7bed4c866672d01e1ba51b4cc360297138465ee5df40f0 genesisTime=2025-03-17 05:10:00 -0700 PDT genesisValidators=1060000`

author: nflaig
content: any reason for changing `MIN_GENESIS_ACTIVE_VALIDATOR_COUNT` compared to mainnet? are there other configs that deviate? (besides like the typical stuff like chain id, genesis time, etc.)

author: arnetheduck
content: I'd like 5k of them as well please - thought that was covered since they were in the holesky genesis set

author: parithosh
content:
Uhh the tool auto filled it afaik, no particular reason to do so.

I think other than forks and chainid, we used all the mainnet specs (including deposit contract).

author: nflaig
content: yes, I confirmed that, only difference was `MIN_GENESIS_ACTIVE_VALIDATOR_COUNT`

author: parithosh
content: Is this a problem btw? Afaik it doesn't matter as its not used post genesis

author: nflaig
content: I don't think so, was just curious
